title: assigncurriculum
introduction:
In this guide, we will show you how to assign curriculum to learners.
A curriculum is a package of learning objects, such as online courses, instructor led events, checklists, or tests.
Managers can assign to their team members, while administrators have broader options depending on their permissions.

steps.title: Introduction
steps.details:
In this guide, we will show you how to assign curriculum to learners.
A curriculum is a package of learning objects, such as online courses, instructor led events, checklists, or tests.
Managers can assign to their team members, while administrators have broader options depending on their permissions.

steps.title: Search for an Curriculum
steps.details:
1. Click the menu icon.
  2. Under the Learning dropdown, select Assign Training.
  3. The Learning Search Page will populate.
  4. Simply enter a key word or the name of the curriculum.
  5. Top results will populate in the dropdown.
  6. Press Enter to view all search results
  7. You can use the filter options to narrow your search results.

hotspots.title: Filters
hotspots.description: Use the drop down next to each header to sort your results.

steps.title: Select a Curriculum
steps.details:
Click on the title of the training to access Curriculum Details.

Click Show More if you want to review the details.

Finally, click the white 'Assign' button

steps.title: Select Learners to Assign
steps.details:
1. Here you will see a list of all the learners you have access to.
  2. To select a learner, find their name and click the checkbox next to it.
  3. Checking the box adds the learner to the selected list.
  4. Continue searching for more learners and clicking the checkbox next to their names.
  5. Toggle "Show Selected" to review the full list of selected learners.
  6. Once you have your complete list of names, scroll down and click the blue "Continue to Details" button.

hotspots.title: Show Selected
hotspots.description: Toggle this button to see the currently selected learners.

steps.title: Submit and Confirm the Assignment
steps.details:
1. Here Cornerstone will allow you to identify a due date.
  2. If this field is left blank the assignment will be made with no due date.
  3. Click the checkbox next to "Automatically Register Users."
  4. Once ready, click the blue 'Submit' button.
  5. Cornerstone will navigate you back to the Curriculum Details page.
  6. Notice the green checkmark in the bottom left will fly in with a confirmation that the assignment was made.
  7. The curriculum will now appear for the identified learner on their Assigned Training page in Cornerstone.
